title: Beef and onion pie with cheese crust
description: Beef and onion pie is good - with a cheddar cheese crust its fantastic. This recipe uses budget-friendly minced beef.
ingredients: 225/8oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
75g/2¾oz chilled butter, cut into cubes, plus extra for greasing
75g/2¾oz mature Lancashire cheese, or similar mature crumbly cheese, grated
